messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2251...Ren....healing
messages.msgSnippet: Also Sarah Ban Breathneck s Simple Abundance and her follow up book ... I love these books - The audio version is great... Heather ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Also Sarah Ban Breathneck's "Simple Abundance" and her follow up book
> "Excavating your Authentic Self".

I love these books - The audio version is great...


Heather

----- Original Message -----
From: lurningathome@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 7:43 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2251...Ren....healing


In a message dated 8/15/2002 5:33:38 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> I have found a lot of peace in some books, a lot of healing....
> One is Deepak Chopra's "The Path to Love" I like a lot of what he says and
> he
> seems to blend and embrace a lot of different religious beliefs (the good
> parts of them) and prophets in his writings.
> Also Sarah Ban Breathneck's "Simple Abundance" and her follow up book
> "Excavating your Authentic Self".
> Get those, I can't tell you the healing I've experienced through these
> books.
>
> Ren
>

Ren.....thanks to you to. I am jotting them down.......


Kim
